name: Trash / PC
description:
Trash/PC is a 2D Top down Game developed in Unity3D for Windows by the 2Weeks team. This game was created for the "Mini Jame Gam #13".

The theme of the jam is "Not What It Seems" with "File" being the special object.

Play as Johnny the detective and feed the PC with pure files while trashing the corrupt ones.

Controls:

WASD -> Move

E -> Pick a File

SpaceBar -> Gain a small speed boost but...

Esc -> Pause Game

They all look nice until they turn...

All assets were created by the 2Weeks Team.

Game Design: Vangelis Pappas, Isidoros Tsoulkas

Lead programming: Isidoros Tsoulkas

Programming: Vangelis Pappas

Art & Graphics: Mars Blackbird

Audio: Vangelis Pappas
